Uses of Class
cs302.project4.Shape

    • Uses of Shape in cs302.project4

      Subclasses of Shape in cs302.project4 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Circle
      This is a class of a type of Ring, Circle.
      class  Crescent
      The crescent shape extend the circle shape and create a moon like shape with a two circles overlapped with a radius of distance between their centers.
      class  Quadrant
      This shape extend the square shape and create a 1/4 circle in the 4th quadrant, its origin is the center of the circle.
      class  Rectangle
      Rectangle is the direct subclass of the shape that create a rectangle in relative to the pixmap
      class  Ring
      This a subclass of Shape - Ring, which is a circle like shape that have a inner and outer radius to construct a circle that is surrounding by another circle.
      class  Square
      Square is a subclass of the rectangle shape with a same size for both of the side length (width and height).
      class  Square_Ring
      This square_ring shape extends the shape circle and create a square within a circle that has the side length of the radius.
      class  Triangle
      This is a class for the shape Triangle_Right_Up, which is a subclass of triangle that construct a shape that that has a base of a same size square, but is the isosceles right triangle on the left top side.
      class  Triangle_Left_Down
      This is a class for the shape Triangle_Left_Down, which is a subclass of triangle that construct a shape that that has a base of a same size square, but is the isosceles right triangle on the left bottom side.
      class  Triangle_Right_Down
      This is a class for the shape Triangle_Right_Down, which is a subclass of triangle that construct a shape that that has a base of a same size square, but is the isosceles right triangle on the right bottom side.
      class  Triangle_Right_Up
      This is a class for the shape Triangle_Right_Up, which is a subclass of triangle that construct a shape that that has a base of a same size square, but is the isosceles right triangle on the right top side.
      Methods in cs302.project4 with parameters of type Shape 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void SVG.addShape(Shape aShape)
      The method that we can add the shape to the SVG Shape type arraylist.
      int Shape.compareTo(Shape otherShape)
      This the implementation of the comparable interface that compare the areas of two shapes.
